title: Abel's Revenge
description: This is a story about a city. As with all others, it’s a place of violence. There are murderers, and they live among us.  This is also a tale about a couple — sometimes friends, occasionally lovers, but always partners. Dan and Olivia are fighting modern battles; the ones parents have over a lack of money, time or peace.  An escalating serial killer terrifies the streets and homes. The body count rises as their relationship crumbles. Society reveals its dark side, and no one is safe. Dan and Olivia experience this first-hand as danger closes in.  Will Abel’s reign of terror ever end?  Who will live, and who will die?
author: Ross Greenwood
